subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Scott Boras, the pitcher’s agent, suggested that the team would be putting Harvey, who had Tommy John surgery, at “severe risk” if it allowed him to pitch in the postseason.
snippet: Scott Boras, the pitcher’s agent, suggested that the team would be putting Harvey, who had Tommy John surgery, at “severe risk” if it allowed him to pitch in the postseason.
